resources.string:
Slark's skill



 Strike - Slark uses brute force to deal 50 ~ 100 dmg and restore 10 mp. If Slark misses, he loses 100 hp and the enemy gains 5 mp.

 cost = 0 mp

 Life Steal - Slark uses blood magic to steal 150 ~ 250 hp from the enemy. If Slark misses the enemy gains 5 mp.

 cost = 30 mp

 Stun - Slark uses paralysis magic to deal 40 ~ 60 dmg and stun the enemy for 1 turn. If Slark misses, the enemy gains 5 mp.

 cost = 20 mp

 Regeneration - Slark's Ultimate. Slark uses regeneration magic to fully restore his hp. If Slark fails to regenerate, he dies.

 cost = 30 mp

Huskar's skill



 Strike - Huskar uses brute force to deal 50 ~ 100 dmg and restore 10 mp. If Huskar misses, he loses 100 hp and the enemy gains 10 mp.

 cost = 0 mp

 Super Strike - Huskar uses brute force to deal 150 ~ 250 dmg and restore 20 mp. If Huskar misses, the enemy gains 10 mp.

 cost = 200 hp

 Stun - Huskar uses paralysis magic to deal 40 ~ 60 dmg and stun the enemy for 1 turn. If Huskar misses, the enemy gains 10 mp.

 cost = 40 mp

 Inferno - Huskar's Ultimate. Huskar uses demon magic to deal 500 pure dmg. If Huskar misses, he loses 300 hp.
